body: Thank you very much, Abraham, for your kind help! I found that average data component works for full year hourly results, so, I'm not sure if there is a bug in this component that can't deal with non-annual data. I also noticed, as you mentioned, that there are quite a lot of month-day-hour combination for the HOY component that will make the Microclimate Map Analysis component fail: [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/G6D6VGDF3GumzKsXCFL81KrgdQm-k4B58RnYSWf8-1ibwMw5Ly3-aTZkJ4A98iCBqqP-E85hGYtsmFaXobmnnjANsaDfRABB/7.JPG)[](http://api.ning.com:80/files/G6D6VGDF3Gun6FQPFoW8h74cspsI9IfT0C-FZXqxnFRjZoUgOQ4OQ60*Xp*7igXSRzNSMO8ZMrUTwPiU7p3y942w3kr7VNnj/8.JPG)[](http://api.ning.com:80/files/G6D6VGDF3GsIo1s91Nylv4sv-FtWoJn0Jcrc3anWAriKW0Gak2NRIn1TrpqWy1tkxT*bYeEQeH8vSOuumAEYd5nJY*LdUm-1/9.JPG) So, I'll change the title of this post to get Chris and Mostapha's input.
